main: Speak outsider, on what grounds do you approach the Tower of Chayot?
I was called here by a voice.
Or perhaps your mind has wasted away in the wilderness.
If Master Refael didn't want to see them, they would've been obliterated at the precipice.
Very well, you may ascend. If you're worthy of facing our god, then the paltry things inside shouldn't hinder you
